ransomware_historian.title: Ransomware in Historian Server
detection: Monitor abnormal file access and encryption activity.
Check historian data availability and integrity.
Correlate logs from backup servers for anomalies.
containment: Isolate historian server from network immediately.
Block all SMB and RDP connections to the affected host.
Coordinate with IT to disable external shares.

roles.Plant Manager: Authorize controlled production halt if required.

communication: Inform management and regulatory if data is affected.
recovery: Restore historian data from validated backup.
Patch vulnerabilities before reconnecting to OT network.
post_incident: Conduct lessons learned and tabletop exercise.
ransomware_historian.frameworks: NIST CSF DE.CM, IEC 62443-2-1 IR Procedures

plc_firmware_tampering.title: PLC Firmware Tampering
detection: Review PLC firmware checksums and audit logs.
Verify firmware version mismatches against baseline.

roles.OT Engineer: Validate controller integrity and firmware signatures.
roles.SOC Analyst: Correlate any unauthorized changes from logs.

communication: Escalate to vendor if malicious firmware confirmed.
recovery: Re-flash PLC with validated firmware image.
Recommission and test control loop safely.
post_incident: Deploy code-signing enforcement for PLC updates.

generic.title: Generic OT Incident Response
detection: Collect incident details and verify alarm sources.
containment: Isolate affected systems to prevent propagation.
communication: Report to internal IR team and management.
recovery: Restore operations safely using validated backups.
post_incident: Conduct root cause analysis and update response plan.
